Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders basic
net income loss available to common stockholders diluted

Interest Income: interest and fee income loans and leases held for sale
interest and fee income loans and leases held in portfolio
Other Income (Expense): availableforsale securities gross realized gain loss excluding other than temporary impairments
debt securities available for sale realized gain loss
interest income expense after provision for loan loss

General and Administrative: employee benefits and share based compensation
Other Operating Expenses: provision for loan lease and other losses

Other Comprehensive Income: change in fair value of impaired securities recognized in other comprehensive income

Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: automated teller machine servicing fees net
fee and commission credit and debit cards
fee and commission fiduciary and trust activities
fees and commissions mortgage banking and servicing
investment advisory management and administrative fee

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
